text: Bak Jega (; 1750 - 1805) was a Korean politician, writer, and scholar in the Joseon Dynasty. He is best known as a Neo-Confucian scholar and as an early Silhak scholar. == References == * 우린 아직 박제가를 모른다 조선일보 2010.02.23 * 중상학파 (重商學派) * 1997년 08월의 문화인물:초정 박제가(楚亭 朴齊家) Category:1750 births Category:1805 deaths Category:Korean educators Category:Korean politicians
title: Bak Jega
